title.rendered: Hikvision DarkFighter DS-2CD2765G0-IZS 6MP Outdoor Network Dome Camera

content.rendered: The Hikvision DS-2CD2765G0-IZS is a 6MP varifocal dome camera with a 1/2.4? progressive scan CMOS chip and a focal length of 2.8  12mm. The DS-2CD2765G0-IZS has enhancing features such as 120dB wide dynamic range (WDR), high light compensation (HLC), 3D digital noise reduction (3D DNR) and back light compensation (BLC), giving users detailed, high quality images in low-light environments. This camera is fitted an IR range of up to 30m, a working temperature of -30 °C to +60 °C, with IK10 vandal-proof housing, IP67 weather-proof housing, making it perfect for outdoor use, with protection from outdoor conditions, although it can be used indoors too. It is then supported by 3-axis, panoramic & rotation movement of 0° to 355° and a tilt of 0° to 75°, which allows the camera to cover any area needed.

excerpt.rendered: Hikvision Darkfighter series is designed to provide better picture quality in the dark or, in poor light conditions. With superior Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) and low-light color, you can capture both bright areas and dark areas clearly, allowing you to produce crystal-clear recordings, even when it is pitch black.
